name: nativescript-filterable-listpicker
description: A modal list picker with filtering capabilities.

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.debug.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns debug ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.debug.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns debug android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-filterable-listpicker && tns plugin add ../src && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../src && npx rimraf -- node_modules
